pr_title: [JENKINS-61178] When defining an extra container in a pod template with a custom working dir, it is wrongly used as the node working dir

timeline.bodyText: Is this related, or just a deprecation warning?
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: I guess you addressed the deprecation while dealing with the remoteFs?
replies.author: jglick

timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: Not a bug, but with the impl change, having the pod at hand is mandatory, so this is combined with https://github.com/jenkinsci/kubernetes-plugin/pull/717/files#diff-7de256a4d98e2297b5323f04b76bd471R410
replies.author: Vlatombe

timeline.author: jglick
